website_summaries.verdict: In addition to high points for customer service, this 30-inch model is quiet yet solid and considered powerful by a majority of homeowners.
pros: Includes attractive brushed stainless steel finish, discreet but easy-to-use buttons for its 4-speed motor setting, auto timer and shut off, plus dishwasher-safe baffle filters
cons: Reports of lights flickering out and then failing
Installation may not be as simple or quick as other range hood models

customer_reviews.title: Quiet!  Meet all expectations
customer_reviews.text: Quiet even on the highest setting if you’ve ever owned a Undermount microwave and turned on the fan it’s about five times louder than this Hood . Breathless beautiful well-built I would’ve given it four stars but as other people mentioned the directions are a little vague .I am a contractor so I had no problem installing it . The lights are just bright enough and the fact that they are in the rear of the hood allows them to light the range perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie A

customer_reviews.title: It is loud and failed to work after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I installed this hood four months ago. 1. It’s not quiet. At level 1, it makes it difficult to listen to the radio. 2. This past week the lights stopped working. I called and they said it’s a common problem. A week later, A new part arrived to replace the LED transformer. I installed it myself and it did not work. I called again, so they agreed to send out a replacement for all the inside electronics. I cannot endorse, not do I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Unfinished hood
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hood in September during a recent kitchen renovation. I have 10 foot ceilings in the kitchen so I was told I needed the chimney extension that was available for purchase. I called zline and was told the chimney extension won’t be available until sometime in November. The company was very unhelpful in helping me locate a replacement so now I have a brand new refinished kitchen w an unfinished hood. The company sells hoods without providing or making available the necessary accessories available to finish the job. So I can’t recommend this product if you need a hood that requires a chimney extension
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: ... to call amazon for an exchange which they were awesome about. However here are the issues
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and its not even installed yet and I had to call amazon for an exchange which they were awesome about. However here are the issues; the trunk of the hood is white and not stainless steel as advertised and in images; also the trunk is only 31 inches long, and I have a 9 foot ceiling, and its 8 inches too short and that even after we place it 35 inches above the range and its only suggested at 30 inches.
customer_reviews.author: almaz getachew

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this hood I needed to purchase a stainless steel trim piece for the top as my ceiling was not perfectly level. But overall a very nice hood also has a countdown shut off option so when you’re done cooking it will vent for a few minutes to clear off any heat or smoke it may still be there.
customer_reviews.author: Scott and Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Lights went broke
customer_reviews.text: I installed this hood . A week later when electric was turned on. All worked fine. Three hours later. I wanted to see the lights in action. Well they are not working. Nothing. Broke same day it was put in use. When I take the lights out they flicker for a moment, then nothing. Sucks! Installed in a new construction house.
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Has a scratch where glass meets duct
customer_reviews.text: Scratch not aesthetically pleasing. Builder just now getting around to install, so just missed the return policy. Will see if vendor will make this right. Called vendor, options limited, but scratch not in highly visible area. I'm living with the scratch. Now the unit has an annoying rattle. More noticeable when it starts up and at lower speeds. Blends in after the fan gets to full rotational speed. Repair not really an option. Who wants to disassemble, ship and wait for repair. I cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: jda

customer_reviews.title: How did Z-Line make it on Amazon's Choice?!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY Z-LINE!!! Remember "you get what you pay for" and in this case, this vent hood being cheap was exactly what I got. A cheap vent hood that let grill smoke pour AROUND THE VENT but barely suck any smoke whatsoever. This vent hood must be great for indoors with little smoke, but this vent hood is nowhere near good enough to be used for grilling. I even tried to reach out to Z-Line to see if I could upgrade the fan motor, but no one responded. Seriously, spend a little more money and get something Made in the USA, with better quality and honestly, if it's not 2000CFM don't buy it. Returning this POS to Amazon today.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and functional
customer_reviews.text: This exhaust fan checked most of my boxes except it's a little noisier than I'd hoped. I normally have it on #2 (of 4) when sautéing onions and I have to go in the other room to talk on the phone. Also the lighting is in the rear of the unit. Can't decide if I'd rather have them in the front. The fan seems to remove most of the smell of the cooking food so it doesn't permeate the whole house like my old unit did (didn't)
customer_reviews.author: em79902

customer_reviews.title: a good sucker
customer_reviews.text: We put a commercial range in our house and needed a hood fan. This fan is ok. After 2 years of use it is still working so that is good. The main complaint I have is the shoddy/cheap wiring and harness of the light bulbs. We've had the bulbs come loose and the wiring doesn't hold in place. I've rigged it so it works for the time being but it's temperamental. It's a decent hood but I expect more from the electrical wiring.
customer_reviews.author: SJP

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: We spent a lot of money on appliances during our renovation and needed to save some money on the vent hood while still keeping that expensive look. We turned to Amazon for a solution and landed on this Zline. We couldn't be happier. I can buy but 3 of these for less than the cost of 1 at the appliance store. It has great air movement was a top criteria for us when picking a vent hood and is quiet, and has washable filters. So far, it has been our top kitchen buy.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service experience
customer_reviews.text: The LED lights stopped working after about 6 months. I contacted customer service and they promptly mailed me free replacement parts that fixed the issue. I was not expecting Z Line customer service to be of much help after reading several reviews here; however, my experience with them was very positive.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff McDougall

customer_reviews.title: Low profile, attractive, easy to clean, powerful!
customer_reviews.text: As a design professional, I didn’t want the typical in your face exhaust. My home is MCM so the low square profile fits well. The flat surface also creates a ledge. I love the high CFM ducted exhaust and stainless grates. Easy to clean. Will be ordering another for a second MCM home.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie

customer_reviews.title: Nice hood
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an open box item and therefore a reduced price, but it's a great hood regardless. The stainless construction is solid, with a clean contemporary appearance. The exhaust fan has multiple speeds, from a whisper to way more than you need, and it works great. Lights are a nice touch, and filters should be easy to clean. Could easily be dressed up with a hood cover or different finish as well. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Digital 14

customer_reviews.title: he normally would see similar units like this easily sell for $500-800
customer_reviews.text: I had this professionally installed. The installer was very impressed with the hood, especially with the low price. He commented, he normally would see similar units like this easily sell for $500-800.00. He also said it was a very easy install. I'm so impressed with the high end look! I purchased 3 medium S-hooks at Lowes for a few dollars to hang utensils in the back. It looks very impressive. The fan isn't louder than any other I've seen and the light underneath lights up the kitchen nicely in the evenings. I especially like the blue LED control buttons. I'm so thrilled with this hood I hope it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Nee Nee

customer_reviews.title: Z Line KB-30 Stainless Steel Wall Mount Range hood
customer_reviews.text: Nice power Range vent hood that saved me money! saved about 150 vs ordering it at the box stores. Came all together and wrapped nice so no damage was done in the shipping process, It was pretty easy to install except having to get in the attic and run duct work. Wish the lights were LED and in the front as these are in the back. How-ever, others I found were more costly and this one and I have gotten many compliments
customer_reviews.author: William S.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 48 inch model and I’m pretty happy with it. The 760CFM works really good with my commercial stove at home. I have a 2 story home with concrete walls so I definitely needed a ductless type. The only thing was that the hood was a little bit bend but because it was in the back the damaged part went directly to the wall. The other thing was that because it was such a big box I had to have it delivered in FL with amazon Prime to a friends home and then pay to have it sent by ship to PR. But I’m very happy with my decision.
customer_reviews.author: Xiomarie Benito

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Great Price!! Amazing customer service!! Buy here if you have high standards!!
customer_reviews.text: Have had the vent hood 9 months and can report it is an excellent product at a great price!!! Very quiet and looks beautiful. Could easily pass for a product twice it's price. Very sturdy and easy to install. One of the light bulbs (LED) burned out recently and when I called (2 separate calls) customer service, each time a very friendly human being answered immediately, pulled up my order from my name and sent out replacement parts for free the same day. 3 year warranty on parts is awesome!! Best customer service I've come across in years!! Wish I needed another hood!
customer_reviews.author: Brice Mertz

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and looks for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time searching for this good. There were so many options to choose from. I found this one, mainly because it offered two options. The first was an extension for the exhaust fan since my kitchen is nearly 11 feet high and the second was a charcoal filter since I do not have direct outside access. I have been pleasantly surprised by the quality and the noise level. Plus I think it looks great. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very noisey and cheap appearing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit because I read that it would be quiet. This unit is very noisy and I really can't believe how loud it is. In addition, it appears to have a "cheap" look to it. I really question reviews on amazon and feel i have been mislead.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Del Priore

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit at a budget
customer_reviews.text: Looks really classy, for section features, not super quiet but not terribly loud, Contractor said it was easy to install, has two lights toward the rear which are very nice would have liked to lights in the front as well but I guess for this price...
customer_reviews.author: audrey  adler

customer_reviews.title: kitchen redo
customer_reviews.text: This range hood is so cool. Renovating the kitchen (walls, range, floors, counter tops, some cabinets) lots of stainless and brushed nickel. This range hood is classy but unique looking. Very functionsl, lots of light, the controls are easily accessed, just discovered the three minute delay on shutting off fan. Of course you can hear the fan when running, but not bad, I've had much louder ones. Exhausts well. Really like this unit, fits in nicely with the look I'm working for. Installation wasn't bad, but we had rebuilt that wall and put in extra cross-bracing for this type of hood, don't know that that was necessary, but I don't worry about it coming loose or vibrating.
customer_reviews.author: RITTHC

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to my kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the hood , love the slick style, it’s powerful enough that we can cook and it removes almost all the smell . It is a bit loud but it’s not extremely loud . We are very happy with the product , absolutely recommend it ! Price is fantastic as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Range Hood Success.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my new kitchen. Little noisy. Inside vented seems to be working satisfactorily.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Cooney

customer_reviews.title: Z Line KZ Range Hood.
customer_reviews.text: The unit arrived in good condition, considering it was a reduced price due to outside packaging damage. There was one screw missing to hold the glass canopy. The only problem with those units is the stainless steel exhaust cover. Instead of having the base unit 20" long, both units come in 16" and when assembled it amounts to 31" total lengths from top of unit to ceiling. In my case the height was borderline and left me with a maximum hood height to the range distance. Noise level at range 1 is adequate with increasing noise on level 2,3 and 4.
customer_reviews.author: Hans Ullmer

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: I read a review that said the air flow was weak, but I can say that mine is quite powerful. There were no frustrations or disappointments in the install. Everything that was needed was included. The directions were adequate. The unit looks and functions very nice. I'm not sure if it is clear in the product description, but the chimney is only tall enough for 8' ceilings. It is about 4" too short for my 9' ceiling. Since I vented it through the wall I probably won't bother with getting an extension to take it all the way to the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Kipp Woodard

customer_reviews.title: Lights died after 6 months of use
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed to have the lights just stop working. I've called a repairman and he couldn't diagnose it. One side has about 11 volts coming into it and the other side barely a 5. It appears to be an electrical shortage and would cost more than the hood did to rewire and repair. Other than looking very nice and have had plenty of compliments, this item appears to be junk if it only last less than 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This worked out perfect for us
customer_reviews.text: This worked out perfect for us. We were in the middle of our kitchen renovation and I selected two hoods from two sites. I was under a time constraint as I needed to have all pieces to be installed for the electrician who I hired for one day. This was delivered in less than two days. Fan is very effective and not that loud as you can adjust speeds. The light is great and highlights just where you need to see.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A. Carlton

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and preforms good
customer_reviews.text: Loved everything about this hood! I have had it for almost 2 years and didn't use it the first 6 or so months because of finishing my addition. My lights are no longer working... I do cook quiet a bit but I still think it is weird both of the lights are out at the same time... Also don't like that I spent ~$350 and the lights only worked for a year. I read plenty of reviews saying this but loved the look and now I am kind of irritated the lights are out already.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and modern
customer_reviews.text: This is a very beautiful, modern and affordable range hood. You will have to put in a makeup air fan because it is so powerful which costs a few hundred dollars and required an HVAC contractor. It arrived with a small dent in the chimney and Zline immediately sent me a new one. Great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: June Jewell

customer_reviews.title: Very well designed
customer_reviews.text: I love our Vent Hood, it's amazing-high quality and professional. I had to call customer service to help with which product to purchase, and if I needed a chimney extension, and they were wonderful (and so helpful). I love how easy the filters can come off to clean, and the four speeds to vent are perfect. The LED lights are great, and you are able to angle them if you want to. It's also super easy to clean, and the overall look is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Sara L. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for buck.
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product for the price. Very strong suction. However, the grease traps are a bit flimsy and tedious to put back because there are these tabs that hold them up which get stuck and you have to push the two layers back together for the tabs to pop back out to lock it into the hood range.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful hood, makes kitchen look great
customer_reviews.text: I originally received a damaged hood and the seller responded to my email within a day and had it picked up and sent out a new one pronto, so the customer service is excellent. The second hood I received was perfect. We installed it and it looks fantastic. It looks much more expensive than it was (easily as nice as the $1,500 hoods at Home Depot and Lowe's) and works like a charm. It's not that quiet, but not overly loud, either, even on high. Pretty much a noise level that you'd expect from any hood. I highly recommend this hood.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki K.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and works better.
customer_reviews.text: For the price you just can't get a better hood. Heck for the price plus $200 you can't find a better hood. Looks fantastic against my red brick wall. The halogen lights are very useful and the baffles can break down for easy cleaning. On top of all that, if you burn something just hold onto something solid (probably an exaggeration), turn the fan on 4 and you'll evacuate all smoke out of the kitchen. You remember the scene in Alien: Resurrection when the alien hybrid gets pulled out the airlock screaming Momma? Its like that but not in space, or with an alien, or with Sigourney Weaver.
customer_reviews.author: DoCCoS

customer_reviews.title: I'm not as happy with this hood as with a previous hood from ...
customer_reviews.text: Two of the grills on the underside of the hood are warped and hang below the hood. They also vibrate loudly and the lower speeds. I'm not as happy with this hood as with a previous hood from a different manufacturer. Update: I contacted the seller and they immediately sent replacement grills/baffles. It no longer vibrates loudly with the new baffles. I will update my review to 4 stars instead of 2 since it operates fine now and looks great, and because of their prompt customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Lance R Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Light kit failed
customer_reviews.text: After less than a year of operation the lights started to strobe. Contacted company - provided proof of purchase but promised replacements never appeared.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: extremely pleased
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I'm extremely pleased. Looks incredible and makes a huge statement.
customer_reviews.author: norman smith

customer_reviews.title: OMG!
customer_reviews.text: So awesome and easy to use. If you have tall ceilings, be ready for an expensive install, but really a terrific appliance. My came bent and I'm still giving five stars, because I love it so much. The bent part can't be seen with how it's currently positioned and installed. Anyway, this has some serious sucking power. Plus, the lighting is terrific. I read other reviewers say its not, but in my opinion it has great lighting. If you don't have under cabinet lighting, I guess I could see how they might think the lighting was insufficient. I hope it lasts. Been using it for 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Chewbacca

customer_reviews.title: must admit that the quality of construction is subpar although the Hood looks good. By subpar construction I mean
customer_reviews.text: Just installed the Hood...Hmmnnn...must admit that the quality of construction is subpar although the Hood looks good. By subpar construction I mean: the rear is weakly spot welded; the rear panel that faces the wall is warped and had to be slightly hammered flat. I accidentally put a bit of pressure on the front shelf while trying to erect the chimneys...pop went the inner bracket that holds the entire front upright; again it was spot welded at 4 different places. Had to pop rivet the bracket back in it's position in order to hold the entire front at 90 degree angle. I guess "you get what you pay for".....
customer_reviews.author: Elmer H. Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Well build and very good customer support
customer_reviews.text: Very well built hood. I contacted there support about an installation question and they were very pleasant and knowledgeable. The fan can move plenty of air. The lowest speed is usually enough for normal use. I like the 3 minute turn off delay. The lights work well also.
customer_reviews.author: Larry D

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, but lights blink on and off
customer_reviews.text: I bought one in 2014 and after a few months the lights started clicking on and off by themselves, so I returned it and had a new one sent out..after a few more months it started flashing on and off again during a family get together so I disconnected it. looks nice but not sure if there is anyway to find service for it?
customer_reviews.author: Mark Buetow

customer_reviews.title: Great hood range
customer_reviews.text: This was the last item for my kitchen remodel. It completed the look for the kitchen. The range hood works great. The sound didn't seem to loud to me, but the previous one I had was super loud so this was an improvement. I had a friend install and a roofer and a vent up. Set up was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Really Great Range Hood
customer_reviews.text: We have installed a new kitchen and this range hood both looks great and does a fantastic job. Includes an internal grease trap that can be emptied. Very nice range hood and pretty quiet too!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth R Iverson

customer_reviews.title: Instructions
customer_reviews.text: Instructions assume the installer is comfortable filling in multiple details. Manual covers multiple models and mainly covers the highlights. Online materials and printed versions different and more than once neither actually matched the unit itself. Fortunately nothing was seriously off-base so tweaking worked just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Palmer Bell

customer_reviews.title: It's great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than it looks but seems to work well and isn't terribly noisy. Great light and great design. And yes, great company service as others have said when we didn't understand something about a part - no perma hold, and knowledgeable rep. Only weird thing is that you have to click the far left button to turn it on, THEN choose another button for how strong you want it (why not just push the 1/2/3/4 button?). But hey it was a GREAT deal and SO nice to finally have a range hood after the tiny lame one that was in the wall before :)
customer_reviews.author: EcoGrrl

customer_reviews.title: No way this is more than around 200 cfm
customer_reviews.text: I thought the description was too good to be true, and I was right. Shame on me. Mounting was straightforward and easy, and it is fairly heavy gauge stainless, but I have to remove the filters to get it to pull anything closely resembling enough air to get the most basic ventilation, and I have it vented directly outside through the wall at the top of the hood, with only one elbow.. Save your money and don't buy this piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Lach

customer_reviews.title: The description says 26 - 40". However, the ...
customer_reviews.text: The description says 26 - 40". However, the longest you can get (chimney cup + 2 chimney pieces ) is 36". I need to buy an extension to cover 4" that I need to install the hood for my 8.5 ' ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: ET

customer_reviews.title: One of best Extractor for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, I just wish I would of purchased the 36" instead of the 30". The CFM's are awesome. I learned a long time ago to go overboard with the CFM extracting capacity. Its better to have more and just use the extractor on a lower setting. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: I.S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and works well for non vented space
customer_reviews.text: This vent is perfect for our kitchen. It is very functional and the light is nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Witkowski

customer_reviews.title: Very good Steel wall mounted Range Hood
customer_reviews.text: We bought the z-line kl2-30inch range-hood to install in our newly remodeled kitchen. I actually installed with venting and it looks and works very well! No issues in the install or quality of the range hood. For the price it is better in quality than a $1000 dollar hood. Very nice would buy another z-line product!
customer_reviews.author: cmcint01

customer_reviews.title: Powerful yet silent
customer_reviews.text: I use this range often in the 1st and 2nd settings with great results. They are not noisy and effectively remove the smell of food.
customer_reviews.author: My account

customer_reviews.title: Great looking air mover
customer_reviews.text: Fan noise is reasonable. This thing moves some air!! Looks great. Easy install, would help if the mounting holes/hardware could accommodate existing crown molding? Took almost as long to remove the protective film as it did to install it?
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Schlomm

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice,but had electrical short
customer_reviews.text: This product looks very nice.when comparing it to others product,considering price, it is a good buy and no one will ever be the wiser. It vents great, the multiple speeds are helpful, and it is fairly quiet for a stove fan. However after installing and working for a few days the fan experienced an electrical short where when you push the button for the light it doesn't come on. didn't return it and just deal with it as the light does eventually come on the fan still functions normally.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and clean.
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of hardware. The biggest issue we had with it was that the sleeve that covers the vent is next to impossible to slide apart. It took two people and a lot of time to slide it apart, then it took a lot longer to adjust it to just the right distance apart to fit right. Now that it is up and I don't have to adjust it anymore I am in love. -Pros Great fan Easy to clean vents Great adjustable lights -Cons That stupid vent sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan R.

customer_reviews.title: Product came with a dent and 3 scratchs
customer_reviews.text: Product came with a dent and 3 scratchs from MFG.
customer_reviews.author: victor gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Nice design but the lights are in a weird spot ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice design but the lights are in a weird spot and after only 4 months they are both blown. Hopefully the replacement bulbs aren't too expensive. And the fan motor is louder than I was hoping for but is powerful. Overall for the price not too bad
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Draws well and not too loud.
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in a remodel I was doing for my self. Hanging the hood was straight forward and I was able to adapt the stack because of a tricky situation not related to the hood. Looks nice and understated. I would like it a little stiffer as I use the flat top to keep frequently used ingredients close at hand. It is not a very quiet vent but the levels are in keeping with others I have seen and it does suck the smoke nicely out of my small kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks decent product with good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Contacted the customer service for an extra part. They sent it in quickly with no charge. Liked it. In terms of pricing and quality, it's been something that I'd recommend so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ramtin

customer_reviews.title: Make the work and looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love the range hood Easy to install and I use ductless I ordered the carbon filter too. The range hood come with 4 speed I don't cook a lot fry foods and when I do it the 2 speed make the work neutralizing the odor Help me a lot when I boil water and make soup too, is ease to clean and look beautiful I recommend,
customer_reviews.author: Brow

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: First vent that actually removes steam/smoke from kitchen. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Umbach

customer_reviews.title: lights are no good
customer_reviews.text: unit is very nice looking but both lights failed within a month
customer_reviews.author: Jim Cuthbertson

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: The hood arrived quickly and very well packaged. I opened it up to check everything and was quite pleased with the quality of the product. I don't have this installed yet, so I will update my review after I get some use out of it. edit: I have had this installed for a few months now and still love it. Very nice looking and and works like a champ. Not much else to say really, except that it's awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Rob B.

customer_reviews.title: Z line range hood
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this product,works well looks nice the read out is simple and looks classy. I had looked at models with bolder LED read outs, $ 150.00 dollars more but I was concerned with power surges knocking out the circuit board. You need to be careful with the vent stack it can scratch easily.It isn't quite. The two 20 watt lights in the back bottom of the unit are bright and swivel nice. We have had the unit for a month now and very pleased. I have always had great experience with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Tahlequah

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and highpowered
customer_reviews.text: My contractor installed this for me and said it was so easy! It is very sleek and I get many complements. The lights are perfect for night and for highlighting my backsplash but I really love the low noise and high power vent so my house doesn’t stink when cooking!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Very good range hood
customer_reviews.text: Very nice range hood. Looks perfect. Good fan, and not too loud (though you can hear it for sure). The lights are great - they swivel to point where you want them to.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in perfect condition and worked as it should. Installation was fairly simple. The lights are bright enough and the fan is very powerful without being too loud. Only suggestions are to make the upper bracket bigger and with some adjustment ( I did have to customize it slightly to get the screw holes to line up) they also could leave more room for the lights to tilt without hitting the control panel inside the hood. Overall very happy- works well and looks good - much less expensive than others we found
customer_reviews.author: KNebrig

customer_reviews.title: Works great, I use the fans about 2 times a ...
customer_reviews.text: Longevity Review: I have mine 3 years and I have it installed outside under roof for my outdoor kitchen. I live in Central Florida. I use the charcoal filter system. Works great, I use the fans about 2 times a week on average. I thought for the price paid I'd be replacing after a year, especially outside. Very happy great product. .
customer_reviews.author: Bob S

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and effective
customer_reviews.text: This hood is great. It has a nice look to it and is very effective. I just applied three coat of seasoning to a new carbon steel wok, which generated a ton of smoke. This hood didn’t skip a beat. There was no smoke buil up in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: W&K

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great vent hood. I use the charcoal filters for mine (plan to vent outside at latter date) and it works great! It is a little loud- but that is a fair trade off for me considering how well it works. The installation was super easy- I have had a more difficult time hanging some of my artwork.
customer_reviews.author: Whoa Babe

customer_reviews.title: Love the style!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the hood & the lights that move around to highlight what you’re cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Repackaged, missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: Item seems like it was repacked, arrived a day after a notification said it was three stops away. It is missing the crown molding, mounting bracket, all screw hardware. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, excellent customer support
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, easy to install. Product offers sufficient suction for large range (viking commercial) and looks great. Customer support was very helpful and resolved issue quickly without additional charge or painful series of unnecessary questions.
customer_reviews.author: J. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Z line customer service
customer_reviews.text: This a revision of my previous review. I haven't opened the box for the range hood yet but Laureen at Z line was so helpful in following up with the order status. not sure what happened exactly with the previous shipment but when I asked where the hood was and that the tracking # was useless, she followed up right away and sent a 2 day delivery. it just arrived and I can't express how impressed I am with the Z line customer service. I hope the hood is just as impressive. Nice to see a company who actually cares. This will complete the kitchen remodel. Thank you Z line and thank you Laureen.
customer_reviews.author: JH DVM

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhhh vent, lights so nice
customer_reviews.text: This is really beautiful, I needed a vent and fan so badly. My house was built in 1937 and never had a vent just a hole through the top of the room into the attic. I hated that anything I cooked stayed in the air for days, and days. This works so well! The lights are such a nice touch, It took some demo but its worth it. Oh and did I say it is really beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Herzuki

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: + Very powerful fan. Controls easy to use. Working ok after 1 year. + Filters design very easy to clean. - Should have come with led lighting. I replaced the 50W halogen bulbs with 2W leds. - Finish could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Bocaranda B

customer_reviews.title: This Purchase Is A No-Brainer From Every Perspective
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, knock-out look. Added significantly to the appearance and function of our kitchen remodel. A real bargain at around $300. Works well, too. Form, Fit and Function - look no further, just virtually mash that buy button.
customer_reviews.author: ReaderHal

customer_reviews.title: Looks and Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: It is a quality fan and customer service is great. The only reason that I didn't give it 5 stars is because it not really made to be a wall mount. As with a true wall mount fan the exhaust outlet exhausts out the back. This exhausts out the top and you will have to make some modifications to your existing duct work.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful vent hood. Much nicer than others I considered for twice the price. Fan has multiple speeds and is not particularly loud. It has 2 lights that provides ample light to cover 36" cooktop. Additionally, the double lights create a nice effect on the backsplash.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The lcd control LED does not show the correct values and seems broken since day one. I am unable to find a replacement part for it.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: Great power!
customer_reviews.text: Great suction! I can cook fish and you can hardly smell it! Nice design and makes my kitchen look great!
customer_reviews.author: stru

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Works and looks great. Great value. The operation of the fan is a bit wonky, but you get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Dakshesh Patel

customer_reviews.title: Very simple install and looks beautiful. It does use a 3-prong power plug that ...
customer_reviews.text: Very simple install and looks beautiful. It does use a 3-prong power plug that we spliced to hardwire into the house power. Expecting for a customer to use a wall outlet to power this is silly.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Anderson

customer_reviews.title: We are not happy with it at all
customer_reviews.text: The power is not as strong as decribed, the vent hood cover is very short. We are not happy with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Had some questions before purchasing and the customer service came back to me with all the answers so gave me confidence to purchase it. Had a contractor install it as I have no experience with these devices and it works great. we vented it to the outside and the first few uses have been a success. It is powerful and it looks very good,
customer_reviews.author: Alex H

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: I just installed this two days ago. Very quality product. Looks great. Install instructions were terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Family

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Find for my new kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit unsure of the look of this product since I ordered it online and the price was so very reasonable. Turns out, it looks just fabulous. More than I expected. I had trouble with the lighting but called the company and they sent me a replacement lighting kit and it works better than ever. I would absolutely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: so happy we ordered a second one
customer_reviews.text: This is our second (in a second kitchen). It looks good and works good and seems effortless for our contractors to install. One vents to the filter and the other vents outside. They work as we expect them to. The fan can be loud when it is on high, but that is what I would expect.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Szuflita

customer_reviews.title: Great looking product that works great too
customer_reviews.text: It looks great in my kitchen, is relatively quiet, and sucks a lot of air. I have never needed to use speed 4. Usually 1 or 2 will work just fine. Installation was easy.
customer_reviews.author: K. Yellen

customer_reviews.title: asthetically looks good. price was reasonable
customer_reviews.text: asthetically looks good. price was reasonable. I figured it wouldn't be that loud but boy was I wrong; its quite loud. I was on a budget so I purchased it but in the future will definitely look into a much quieter vent. overall though I have to give it a 4 star since it met all the other parameters I desired
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have a new home we just built and put this in. It's VERY nice and looks wonderful! It's beyond me why anyone would pay more for something like this that looks the way it does. It has great lighting and some serious suction! Works great! I'd definitely recommend over and over again!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great hood vent
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, works great, has reasonable sound levels for the suction. Looks much more expensive than what it is. Installs very easily. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cheri hansen

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Shipment was pretty fast. The glass can intact upon arrival. My husband set it up pretty easy. I love how it compliments my kitchen and wouldn’t have made anyother choice for the price !!! Will admit that on the 4th setting it is a bit loud but I don’t mind because it does the job!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loud..
customer_reviews.text: Works greats and looks really nice, just a little loud...
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, beautiful looks
customer_reviews.text: This hood is beautiful and a central piece in our kitchen. It's a little on the noisy side, but I guess they all are. The lights are very nice and bright.
customer_reviews.author: FlyingSandal

customer_reviews.title: We love the look of this in our kitchen
customer_reviews.text: We love the look of this in our kitchen, need a replacement light that was not working and the customer service was wonderful and very easy to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Anjelika James

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the price and Quality is Top Notch!!
customer_reviews.text: so great looking and I could never find this quality at this price in the stores. So Happy and easy to care for.
customer_reviews.author: Deep Puddle

customer_reviews.title: Great hood, had shipping damage.
customer_reviews.text: its a great hood for the money, my only issue is that it was damaged on a corner. Probably from shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: installs easily. Very powerful fan
customer_reviews.text: looks fabulous, installs easily. Very powerful fan, we only run it on 1, never on 2, 3, or 4.
customer_reviews.author: CheChe B

customer_reviews.title: Tricky to install for 8' ceilings
customer_reviews.text: The only tricky part about the installation was that my ceiling was too low to assemble the rectangular duct cover as it was. I had to cut both sections in half to be able to fit in my eight foot kitchen with soffit. This would be perfect for someone with high ceilings. Well made and works great, but not everyone has a high speed cut off wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Ezra J. Engle

customer_reviews.title: Discolored
customer_reviews.text: I really like the hood but there is discoloration around the buttons (maybe from sticker). I cannot get it off and have tried stainless steal cleaner. It’s driving me crazy! Any recommendations?
customer_reviews.author: S. Williamson

product_meta.title: Z Line KE-30 Stainless Steel Wall Mount Range Hood, 30-Inch
product_meta.description:
Range Hood.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
30" Wall Mounted Range Hood. 3 Speed Touch Sensitive Electronic Controls, 3 Baffle Filters, Easy to Install With Everything Included. In Stock for Immediate Delivery in Chimney Extensions Available for up to 12' Ceiling This Attractive and Versatile Wall Mounted Range Hood looks and works great in every size. Easily Convertible to "Ductless" by adding the optional Activated Charcoal Filters this unit is easy to install and built for years of trouble free use. This Range Hood comes with blower and fan completely installed, and factory tested. This makes the installation one of the easiest in the industry. KB Wall Hood Power: 110 v/60 Hz Material: 430 Brushed Stainless Output: 760 cfm Lighting: 2 - 25w Halogen Lights Controls: 3 Speed Touch Sensitive Electronic Filters: 2 BAFFLE Air Outlet: 6? Certification: CE, GS, and CCC safety approvals (US and Canada) Hood + Chimney Extends from 26.3?- 33.8? for up to a 9' ceiling Easily Convertible to ?Ductless? operation Efficient and Quiet Operation.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.3 out of 5 stars30 ratings3.3 out of 5 stars
